WatuPRO Demo Certificate

To: %%USER_NAME%%

This certificate is issued to %%USER_NAME%% for completing the exam “%%QUIZ_NAME%%”.

The grade %%GRADE%% was achieved with %%POINTS%% points on %%DATE%%.

Thank you for taking the time to complete %%QUIZ_NAME%%!

You got this certificate because you achieved %%GRADE%% grade.

This certificate is created in WatuPRO and using the Wordpress rich text editor. So you can include graphics or even media.

You can also use the HTML mode to achieve more advanced formatting.

The certificate can be personalized and will be visible only to the user who achieved the assigned grade.
